H0.text: A pie chart is the type of graph best for recording plant growth over a one-week period.

H1.text: Line graph is the best type of graph for recording plant growth over a one‑week period.

H2.text: Scatterplot is the best type of graph for recording plant growth over a one‑week period.

H3.text: Histogram is the type of graph that would be best for recording plant growth over a one-week period.

A4.text: A line chart may be used to demonstrate the trend over time.

A5.text: Time-series: A single variable is captured over a period of time, such as the unemployment rate or temperature measures over a 10-year period.
